messages.content: As of my last knowledge update, the Prime Minister of India is Narendra Modi. He has been in office since May 26, 2014. For the most current information, please verify from a reliable source.

As of my last knowledge update, the Chief Minister of Andhra Pradesh is Y. S. Jagan Mohan Reddy. He has been in office since May 30, 2019. Please check a reliable source for the most up-to-date information.
what is your knowledge cut off date
My knowledge cutoff date is October 2021. For the most current information, please verify from up-to-date sources.
Who built you? who is your developer

I was developed by OpenAI, an artificial intelligence research organization. My design is aimed at assisting users with a variety of inquiries, particularly in areas like career advice and technical reasoning.

HIREX is a platform designed to assist users in various aspects of job searching, career development, and recruitment. It may include features like resume building, interview preparation, and job matching. If you're looking for specific functionalities or details, please let me know!

I am an AI assistant, known as MasterMind or 'General,' designed to provide concise and practical advice on career-related topics, resumes, job searches, and technical reasoning. My goal is to help you navigate your professional journey effectively.
